A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ignore the hate. After 3 screenings I can say not only I was pleased\, but the FULL HOUSE crowd of fans filling every seat the every theater\, even just today\, roarded with chears\, laughter\, claps\, and chatter at the end about how much they loved it. I love it. It’s such a fantastic film in every way. Direction\, cinematography\, acting\, story\, fight choreography\, music... I could go on forever. It is a fun\, epic change to the universe yet still feels like Star Wars. Go see it.
